go.description: allows the user to exit room using cardinal direction or exit description

smash.description: allows the user to break an item in their inventory or the current room

put.description: allows the user to place an item in their inventory into the current room

take.description: allows the user to pick up an item in the current room into their inventory

smell.description: allows the user to smell the current room to learn more about their surroundings

listen.description: allows the user to listen in the current room to learn more about their surroundings

look.description: allows the user to look around the current room to learn more about their surroundings

look_at.description: allows the user to look at an item in their inventory or the current room

inventory.description: allows the user to open their inventory and view the items within it

play.description: allows the user to play an item in their inventory or the current room

unlock.description: allows the user to unlock an item in their inventory or the current room

help.description: allows the user to view all usable actions in the game
